name: hilmet

body.origin:
|- wcel(c0, cfv(cmet, chba))
-| wceq(cop(cop(cva, csm), cno), cop(cop(cva, csm), cno))
-| wceq(c0, cfv(cims, cop(cop(cva, csm), cno)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wcel(c0, cfv(cmet, chba))
-| wceq(cop(cop(cva, csm), cno), cop(cop(cva, csm), cno))
-| wceq(c0, cfv(cims, cop(cop(cva, csm), cno)))

body.origin:
|- wceq(c0, cfv(cims, cop(cop(cva, csm), cno)))
-| wceq(cop(cop(cva, csm), cno), cop(cop(cva, csm), cno))
-| wceq(c0, ccom(cno, cmv))

cumulated.origin:
|- wcel(c0, cfv(cmet, chba))
-| wceq(cop(cop(cva, csm), cno), cop(cop(cva, csm), cno))
-| wceq(c0, ccom(cno, cmv))

body.origin: |- wceq(cop(cop(cva, csm), cno), cop(cop(cva, csm), cno))

cumulated.origin:
|- wcel(c0, cfv(cmet, chba))
-| wceq(c0, ccom(cno, cmv))

comment: The Hilbert space norm determines a metric space. (Contributed by NM, 17-Apr-2007.) (New usage is discouraged.)
